channel.description: Recent content in Home on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Add a comment
item.description: Preconditions The module product comment should be installed and configured Go to FO in a product page Steps Step Description Expected result Add a comment in a product page and validate (Try to add comment with specific character) A message should appear If the configuration enable the validation of the comment the comment shouldn’t appear. If it’s disabled the comment appear Check that the rate is correctly calculated The total rate should be the average of all comment rate

item.title: Add a product to a list
item.description: Preconditions Having a customer account NOT logged in No custom wishlist created (only the default one) Having a product with stock a product without stock (stock = 0) a product with a minimum quantity Steps Step Description Expected result Browse through the catalog and open a product page The heart next to the picture is empty Click on the heart A modal appears, telling you to log in before you can add products to your wishlists

item.title: BO - Uninstall the module
item.description: Steps Click on uninstall the module Expected result The module shouldn’t be in the list of install module but in module catalog tab

item.title: Change colors
item.description: Preconditions Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager Search blockreassurance The module should be installed and upgraded to the last version Click on Configure -> Apparence Steps Step Description Expected result Click on the first color (icon color), change it and save The color should be changed in the back office Click on the second color (icon color), change it and save The color should be changed in the back office Save and check in the front office that the color is changed The color should be the new ones

item.title: Change the number of product display
item.description: Preconditions Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager Search ps_featuredproducts The module should be installed and upgraded to the last version Click on Configure Steps Step Description Expected result Change the option “Number of products to be displayed” to 12 A message should appear in green. Number of products should be 12 Go to the front office 12 featured product should be displayed Click on all products Home category should be displayed

item.title: Check the display of the email block in the left column

item.title: Check the display of the module on the dashboard
item.description: Preconditions Module is installed and activated Steps Step Description Expected result Activate Demo Mode and browse each tab of the dashboard (“Sales”, “Orders”, “Cart Value”, “Visits”, Conversion Rate", “Net Profit”) The graphs are displayed for each tab, with different numbers in each tab. Refresh dashboard (new demo values are generated) The numbers and graphs are different In FO, make some visits and orders with several browser, set some of these orders to “Paid” in BO.

item.title: Enable/disable comment validation by employee
